snippet.textDisplay:
i just hope it launches with more colors.... i really don’t like white. too clean. happy not much else has changed, the dualshock 4 is my favorite controller, followed by the SN30pro+ (3rd party that looks like a ds4 f@cked a super nintendo controller). basically, as long as i can use 2 fingers for the shoulder buttons (index fingers on L1 and R1, middle fingers on L2 and R2, also allows the index fingers to be used on the dpad and buttons with out taking thumbs off of the sticks) i’m good. ⬅️this is the main reason i kinda hate the xbox one “bumpers,” they really don’t allow one to do that easily, plus the offset stick doesn’t lend itself well to using the index fingers to “claw” the buttons. stupid offset design. symmetry is key.

edit: complaints about the mic kinda confuse me. i think it’s a weird choice, but just turn off voice chat if you don’t wanna hear other people. on ps4 if you only talk with friends, just use the system’s party chat and leave in-game voice chat off. i’m sure it’ll be the same/similar.

sheesh. the amount of folks who don’t go through the options menu when starting a game for the first time really baffles me.
snippet.textOriginal:
i just hope it launches with more colors.... i really don’t like white. too clean.  happy not much else has changed, the dualshock 4 is my favorite controller, followed by the SN30pro+ (3rd party that looks like a ds4 f@cked a super nintendo controller).   basically, as long as i can use 2 fingers for the shoulder buttons (index fingers on L1 and R1, middle fingers on L2 and R2, also allows the index fingers to be used on the dpad and buttons with out taking thumbs off of the sticks) i’m good. ⬅️this is the main reason i kinda hate the xbox one “bumpers,” they really don’t allow one to do that easily, plus the offset stick doesn’t lend itself well to using the index fingers to “claw” the buttons.   stupid offset design. symmetry is key.

edit: complaints about the mic kinda confuse me.  i think it’s a weird choice, but just turn off voice chat if you don’t wanna hear other people. on ps4 if you only talk with friends, just use the system’s party chat and leave in-game voice chat off. i’m sure it’ll be the same/similar. 

sheesh.  the amount of folks who don’t go through the options menu when starting a game for the first time really baffles me.

snippet.textDisplay: I, like some people, prefer my video game controllers to be heavy enough to know I'm holding it in my hands without looking, but light enough so that it isn't cumbersome in long play sessions. For me personally, that's about the weight of a Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, which I know is on the heavier end of the spectrum.
snippet.textOriginal: I, like some people, prefer my video game controllers to be heavy enough to know I'm holding it in my hands without looking, but light enough so that it isn't cumbersome in long play sessions. For me personally, that's about the weight of a Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, which I know is on the heavier end of the spectrum.

snippet.textDisplay: Those joysticks might have solved the deadzone problem that all controller up to this point have had. It looks to me like the 0 point in the center is possibly non existent with this controller. Like you can switch from left aiming to right aiming instantly instead of having to cross over that 0 point. If so, mouse may have lost it's inherent superiority as an input.
snippet.textOriginal: Those joysticks might have solved the deadzone problem that all controller up to this point have had. It looks to me like the 0 point in the center is possibly non existent with this controller. Like you can switch from left aiming to right aiming instantly instead of having to cross over that 0 point. If so, mouse may have lost it's inherent superiority as an input.

snippet.textDisplay: The only reason I've never bought a Playstation was because of the ugly controllers and horrible home screen. Glad to see they fixed the controller, but I wish they raised the left thumbstick.

snippet.textDisplay:
Controller is ahead of its time, but Sony itself is behind the time... no console was shown yet, but only generating hype with weird moves like: presenting the “logo”, then 2 hour long most boring and useless presentation ever and now controller. What’s next? New HDMI cable included in the box? Or game case design?
Generating hype, but wont show anything useful. Specially now when everyone are home and internet is a huge traffic. Simply disgrace.

Generating hype, but wont show anything useful. Specially now when everyone are home and internet is a huge traffic. Simply disgrace.

snippet.textDisplay: This is literally just an xbox controller.   I've played on playstation since the original and I can say I will not buy this console or any console because I refuse to use a literal brickbats my controller.  Part of what was so cool about Sony controllers was they were small lightweight and easy to hold.  Now were going to a huge frame.  That I'm sure will weigh comparable to an xbox.  And fat ass handles.  I think features are great but they've lost me with the design.  Very disappointed
snippet.textOriginal: This is literally just an xbox controller.
